name: Good Time
content: Woke up on the right side of the bed
一觉醒来发现自己躺在床上
我脑海里这首Prince的歌怎么回事
举起双手如果你今晚意志消沉
Cause it's always a good time
睡觉的时候一丝不挂好像我不在乎
Hopped into a cab take me anywhere
跳进出租车带我去任何地方
如果你今晚心情失落我会陪着你
Cause it's always a good time
We don't even have to try
Woah oh oh oh oh oh oh
Woah oh oh oh oh oh oh
We don't even have to try
吓坏了我又把手机扔进了泳池里
Checked out of my room hit the ATM
退房离开我的房间去ATM取钱
如果你今晚心情失落那我们就一起玩吧
Cause it's always a good time
We don't even have to try
Woah oh oh oh oh oh oh
Woah oh oh oh oh oh oh
We don't even have to try
Woah oh oh oh oh oh oh
Woah oh oh oh oh oh oh
We don't even have to try
